titleStmt.title: A manual, or, Three small and plain treatises viz. 1. Of prayer, or active, 2. Of principles, or positive, 3. Resolutions, or oppositive [brace] divinity / translated and collected out of the ancient writers, for the private use of a most noble lady, to preserve her from the danger of popery, by the Most Reverend Father in God, John, Lord Arch-Bishop of York.
titleStmt.author: Williams, John, 1582-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Garret, and are to be sold by Joseph Clark, and Ralph Needham ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
